PAD_AfterCutscene_2Characters.synopsis: PAD for party banter when players enter SCL, after the cutscene (either SCL_EntryPoint_Mountain.lsj or SCL_EntryPoint_Underdark.lsj, depending on which entrance is used). Lines are generic enough about the shadow curse/look of the land that they work for both entrances to SCL. One line each from two companions if 2+ companions present.
PAD_AfterCutscene_2Characters.how_to_trigger: After the SCL entry cutscene plays for either entrance, should get a 1 line each party banter from 2 companions if 2+ companions present.

PAD_Curse.synopsis: Players are affected by the shadow curse for the first time. They start to lose health, and can feel the darkness starting to suck their life away.

PAD_Curse_2Characters.synopsis: Players are affected by the shadow curse. They start to lose health, and can feel the darkness starting to suck their life away - and 2 party members are available to AD about this.

AD_Sign.synopsis: Sign on the Risen Road before the Shadow Curse

PAD_Curse_4Characters.synopsis: Players are affected by the shadow curse. They start to lose health, and can feel the darkness starting to suck their life away - and all 4 party members are available to AD about this.

PAD_AfterCutscene.synopsis: PAD for party banter when players enter SCL, after the cutscene (either SCL_EntryPoint_Mountain.lsj or SCL_EntryPoint_Underdark.lsj, depending on which entrance is used). Lines are generic enough about the shadow curse/look of the land that they work for both entrances to SCL. Two lines from one companion if only one companion present.
PAD_AfterCutscene.how_to_trigger: After the SCL entry cutscene plays for either entrance, should get a 2-line party banter from a single companion if only one companion present

DaisyAD_ReachTowers.synopsis: DaisyAD that plays on entering SCL from either entry point.
DaisyAD_ReachTowers.how_to_trigger: Load either of the SCL entry points from the debug book and walk towards the center of the map.

PAD_CurseRemovedByLight.synopsis: Curse is removed from player because they are close to a light.
PAD_CurseRemovedByLight.how_to_trigger: After SCL_EntryPoint_VB_Curse plays, remove the curse's influence by approaching a light or lighting a torch,

Underdark.synopsis: Players enter SCL for the first time from the underdark. Surveying the landscape, they reflect on the atmosphere and the shadow curse. The player may or may not have been previously briefed about the shadow curse by the druid Halsin

Mountain.synopsis: Players enter SCL for the first time through the mountain pass. They reflect upon having had a difficult journey. If a second party member is present, they'll point out that you're not alone.The camera then pans to show a group of Absolute cultists nearby, waiting for the drider to guide them.If Minthara has given you the mission to go to SCL the group will be a mix of half-orcs and goblins and the 2nd character will recognise them as the cultists you were looking for.If Minthara has NOT given you the mission to go to SCL the group will just be two goblins.
Mountain.how_to_trigger: Enter SCL through the mountain pass and walk forward. Will only trigger if you haven't entered SCL before.

PAD_AfterCutscene_2Characters_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AfterCutscene_2Characters_0.text: I've never seen darkness like this before. It's unsettling.

PAD_AfterCutscene_2Characters_1.speaker: Player
PAD_AfterCutscene_2Characters_1.text: It's the only way to Moonrise Towers. We have to push through.

PAD_Curse_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_0.text: The shadows are draining me - I can't just walk through them like before.

PAD_Curse_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_1.text: My energy's draining. The shadows are taking their toll.

PAD_Curse_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2.text: The darkness is encroaching. Can't linger here - not like before.

PAD_Curse_3.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_3.text: Something's wrong. I feel weak. Drained.

PAD_Curse_4.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_4.text: The curse is feeding on me - Shar's withdrawn her protection.

PAD_Curse_5.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_5.text: My life's bleeding away. This curse, it's - it's too much.

PAD_Curse_6.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_6.text: This darkness is suffocating. I - I can barely catch my breath.

PAD_Curse_7.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_7.text: The shadows are hungry - and Shar won't help me now.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_2.text: The shadows are hungry - and Shar won't help me now.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_3.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_3.text: The shadows are draining me - I can't just walk through them like before.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_4.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_4.text: These shadows can pull the life from someone - but not me.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_21.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_21.text: I feel it, though. My very being, draining out of me.
PAD_Curse_2Characters_21.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_5.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_5.text: The shadows are hungry - and Shar won't help me now.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_6.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_6.text: Something's wrong. I feel weak. Drained.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_0.text: I feel it too. Losing energy... losing focus...
PAD_Curse_2Characters_0.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_7.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_7.text: My life's bleeding away. This curse, it's - it's too much.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_16.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_16.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_8.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_8.text: The shadows are hungry here. Doesn't seem to affect me though...

PAD_Curse_2Characters_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_1.text: I'm not so lucky. Got to dispel these shadows... somehow...
PAD_Curse_2Characters_1.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_9.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_9.text: The darkness is encroaching. Can't linger here - not like before.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_12.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_12.text: The curse is feeding on me - Shar's withdrawn her protection.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_13.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_13.text: These cursed shadows. I can see your strength wilting by the moment.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_11.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_11.text: Please - I can't go much further. Light up the darkness...
PAD_Curse_2Characters_11.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_14.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_14.text: My energy's draining. The darkness is taking its toll.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_17.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_17.text: We've got to dispel these shadows... somehow.
PAD_Curse_2Characters_17.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_15.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_15.text: The darkness is encroaching. Can't linger here - not like before.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_18.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_18.text: The curse is feeding on me - Shar's withdrawn her protection.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_19.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_19.text: This darkness is suffocating. I - I can barely catch my breath. We need light...

PAD_Curse_2Characters_10.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_10.text: Light, yes. Something to burn the cursed shadows away.
PAD_Curse_2Characters_10.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

PAD_Curse_2Characters_22.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_22.text: The shadows are draining me - I can't just walk through them like before.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_23.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_23.text: Most would be unwise to linger in these shadows.

PAD_Curse_2Characters_20.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_2Characters_20.text: Please, we've got to get to light...
PAD_Curse_2Characters_20.context: NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

AD_Sign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_0.text: *Night and shadow have claimed this place. Turn back.*

PAD_Curse_4Characters_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_4Characters_0.text: |There's no time to waste, we should get away from the darkness.|

PAD_Curse_4Characters_3.speaker: Player
PAD_Curse_4Characters_3.text: |Good idea. Maybe there's somewhere safe from it?|

PAD_AfterCutscene_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AfterCutscene_0.text: I've never seen darkness like this before. It's unsettling.

PAD_AfterCutscene_1.speaker: Player
PAD_AfterCutscene_1.text: But if this is the way to Moonrise Towers, then this is the only path I've got.

DaisyAD_ReachTowers_0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_ReachTowers_0.text: We are approaching the Absolute. A telepathic storm is surging all around us.

DaisyAD_ReachTowers_1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_ReachTowers_1.text: And the eye of the storm lies above that tower.

PAD_CurseRemovedByLight_0.speaker: Player
PAD_CurseRemovedByLight_0.text: That light - it's protecting me from the curse.

Underdark_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party emerges to look across the shadow-cursed lands stretching before them. A dark, grim panorama.

Underdark_9.speaker: Player
Underdark_9.text: The shadow-cursed lands... makes back home in the Underdark seem quaint.
Underdark_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Party looks around in hushed awe,InternalNodeContext: GLO_Halsin_Event_ShadowCurse originates in the Halsin briefing dialogues in Act 1NodeContext: Reacting to view of the dark, foreboding region ahead. A little taken aback. They've previously heard of what's afflicting this place - a shadow curse.

Underdark_8.speaker: Player
Underdark_8.text: What is this place? Makes the Underdark look like a sunlit meadow... I'm not sure I want to step in there.
Underdark_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Party looks around in hushed awe,NodeContext: Reacting to view of the dark, foreboding region ahead. A little taken aback. They aren't aware of what's causing this place's affliction (a shadow curse)

Underdark_3.speaker: Lae'zel
Underdark_3.text: Do you feel it? The chill on your skin, in your lungs? This darkness is diseased.

Underdark_6.speaker: Shadowheart
Underdark_6.text: Those shadows; there's power coursing through them... oddly familiar. Better stay on alert.
Underdark_6.context: NodeContext: Trepidation mixed with awe. Not quite sure if she should be afraid.

Underdark_2.speaker: Karlach
Underdark_2.text: Stand by me if you need to keep warm in this awful place.

Underdark_11.speaker: Narrator
Underdark_11.text: *This is no ordinary darkness. It feels powerful... and familiar. These lands have been blessed by Lady Shar. You must learn more about her presence here.*

Underdark_10.speaker: Astarion
Underdark_10.text: I won't have to worry about the sun, at least.
Underdark_10.context: NodeContext: A little grimly, looking out over a dark, cursed expanse of land.

Underdark_4.speaker: Wyll
Underdark_4.text: A grim sight indeed. My lungs already grow heavy with shadow.

Mountain_32.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_32.text: Don't stick about. A torch will keep you safe - more or less.

Mountain_12.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_12.text: I'll keep an eye for other True Souls and then head to camp. Can't get out of here fast enough.

Mountain_6.speaker: Player
Mountain_6.text: What do you mean 'more or less'?

Mountain_19.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_19.text: There's things in the dark, True Soul. Things that... been touched by the curse. Run and run fast.

Mountain_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cinematic view of the shadowlands, dark and clouded by the shadow curse. The party approaches, stopping just where the shadows grow thickest

Mountain_1.speaker: Lae'zel
Mountain_1.text: Can you feel it? The shadows gnaw at us. Do not take them for granted.

Mountain_28.speaker: Narrator
Mountain_28.text: *This is no ordinary darkness. It feels powerful... and familiar. These lands have been blessed by Lady Shar. You must learn more about her presence here.*

Mountain_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: A torch bobs in the darkness, resolving into a goblin. She looks scared.

Mountain_30.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_30.text: Are... are you... the True Soul?
Mountain_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Jogs to position, before addressing playerNodeContext: scared and out of breath

Mountain_9.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_9.text: I'll take that as a yes. Listen up.

Mountain_36.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_36.text: Grab a torch, stay outta the dark, and move fast. The shadows have eyes. Go on.

Mountain_26.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_26.text: Bless the Absolute. I couldn't take standin' out here much longer.

Mountain_2.speaker: Player
Mountain_2.text: I may or may not be the single greatest True Soul you may or may not have met in your life.

Mountain_10.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_10.context: NodeContext: Confused, kinda scared - thinks it's a test

Mountain_16.speaker: Player
Mountain_16.text: I am death itself, with a tadpole in my skull and sin in my heart.

Mountain_21.speaker: Player
Mountain_21.text: Probably. I'm still trying to figure out who I am.

Mountain_25.speaker: Player
Mountain_25.text: Faith keeps my soul true, yes. What of it?

Mountain_8.speaker: Player
Mountain_8.text: We are all everything, and yet nothing, at the same time.

Mountain_11.speaker: Player
Mountain_11.text: I don't have time for this - begone.

Mountain_3.speaker: Goblin Brawler
Mountain_3.text: A - a thousand sorrys, True Soul, but I've gotta warn you.

Mountain_13.speaker: Player
Mountain_13.text: No, I kill them. And you're next.

Mountain_15.speaker: Shadowheart
Mountain_15.text: That's no ordinary darkness. It feels powerful... and familiar. Stay on your guard.

Mountain_7.speaker: Karlach
Mountain_7.text: Phew. This place is dark beyond dark. You feel it too, right? I'm sticking to light wherever I can find it.

Mountain_4.speaker: Astarion
Mountain_4.text: Can you feel that? The dark, it's... hungry. Best watch the shadows.

Mountain_23.speaker: Wyll
Mountain_23.text: This darkness. It hurts. You must feel it too.

Mountain_14.speaker: Gale
Mountain_14.text: This is no typical gloom. Need to stay alert.
